issue.title: Camera::SetHFOV functions are ambiguous when a double is passed

content.raw:
I suffered this problem today while trying to compile the sjtu_drone simulation for Gazebo 7 (https://bitbucket.org/dannis/sjtu_drone).
I've changed the original code of the simulation by forcing a cast to the ignition definition.

Just to let you know that the issue is still there
content.html:
I suffered this problem today while trying to compile the sjtu_drone simulation for Gazebo 7 (https://bitbucket.org/dannis/sjtu_drone). I've changed the original code of the simulation by forcing a cast to the ignition definition.

Just to let you know that the issue is still there
